title: 8 months of OCaml after 8 years of Haskell in production (2023)
dot:
digraph G{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style="filled", fontname="Helvetica"];Haskell[label="Haskell" color=lightblue];OCaml[label="OCaml" color=lightgreen];Syntax[label="Syntax Comparison
Elegance, Minimalism, Expressiveness" shape=ellipse, style=dashed];Haskell_Syntax[label="Elegant, Concise, Tacit" shape=box, color=lightblue];OCaml_Syntax[label="Great, but less Tacit" shape=box, color=lightgreen];Syntax->Haskell_Syntax;Syntax->OCaml_Syntax;Features[label="Features Comparison
More vs. Simpler" shape=ellipse, style=dashed];Haskell_Features[label="More Features (e.g. GADTs, Type Classes)" color=lightblue];OCaml_Features[label="Fewer Features, Focused Simplicity" color=lightgreen];Features->Haskell_Features;Features->OCaml_Features;Ecosystem[label="Ecosystem
Packages, Libraries" shape=ellipse, style=dashed];Haskell_Ecosystem[label="Large, Overwhelming, Multiple Solutions" color=lightblue];OCaml_Ecosystem[label="Smaller, Solutions Work as Expected" color=lightgreen];Ecosystem->Haskell_Ecosystem;Ecosystem->OCaml_Ecosystem;Tooling[label="Tooling
Build Systems, LSP, Formatter" shape=ellipse, style=dashed];Haskell_Tooling[label="More Complex Tools, Often Frustrating" color=lightblue];OCaml_Tooling[label="Straightforward, Works Most of the Time" color=lightgreen];Tooling->Haskell_Tooling;Tooling->OCaml_Tooling;Compiler[label="Compiler Messages
Error Reporting, Clarity" shape=ellipse, style=dashed];Haskell_Compiler[label="Verbose, Sometimes Distracting" color=lightblue];OCaml_Compiler[label="Concise, To the Point" color=lightgreen];Compiler->Haskell_Compiler;Compiler->OCaml_Compiler;StdLib[label="Standard Library
Core Features" shape=ellipse, style=dashed];Haskell_StdLib[label="Batteries Included (base)" color=lightblue];OCaml_StdLib[label="Barebones, Provides Essentials" color=lightgreen];StdLib->Haskell_StdLib;StdLib->OCaml_StdLib;Conclusion[label="Conclusion
Focus on Building vs. Exploring Features" shape=ellipse, style=dotted];Haskell_Conclusion[label="Haskell: More Features, More Distractions" color=lightblue];OCaml_Conclusion[label="OCaml: More Focus, Simplicity" color=lightgreen];Conclusion->Haskell_Conclusion;Conclusion->OCaml_Conclusion;}

title: Egoless Engineering
dot:
digraph G{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style="filled", fillcolor="#E0E0E0"]; subgraph cluster_intro{label="The .CLUB CLUB
Egoless Engineering";style=dashed;DanMcKinley[label="Dan McKinley
- Engineer since 2000
- Led teams & orgs"];intro[label="Introduction:
- Raised with Calvinist thought
- Got better over time"];}subgraph cluster_problems{label="Common Organizational Problems";style=dashed;problem1[label="Role Division

- Avoid elitism in teams"];}subgraph cluster_success{label="Success Stories";style=dashed;story1[label="Startup Experience
- Transition from rigid roles to flexibility"];story2[label="Empowering Teams
